traits.Aura of Erebos: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the giant must succeed on a DC 18+1d8 + 14 Constitution saving throw, or it takes 10 (3d6) necrotic damage and can't regain hit points until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the giant's Aura of Erebos for 24 hours.
traits.Magic Resistance: The giant has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.Multiattack: The giant makes two slam attacks.
actions.Slam: Melee Weapon Attack: +11+1d8 + 7 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.
actions.Noxious Gust (Recharge 5xe2x80x936): The giant exhales a mighty gust that creates a blast of deadly mist in a 60-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 18+1d8 + 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 36 (8d8) necrotic damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone.
